questions.title: 你觉得这些邵伯湖的龙虾怎么样？
questions.answer: How does these lobsters which come from Shaobo lake taste?

questions.title: 你男朋友已经住院一段时间了，他怎么样了？
questions.answer: Your boyfriend has been stayed in hospital for some time, how does helook?

questions.title: 你能告诉我这块巧克力蛋糕尝起来怎么样吗？
questions.answer: Could you tell me how does this chocolate cake taste?

answer.en: It's a jar of false wine.
How is your journey to Phuket Island?

title: ——你觉得我的宝贝女儿和那个又穷又丑的男孩交往怎么样啊？
——顺其自然吧，不要干扰他们的感情。

answer.en: How is my dear heart to mix with that poor and ugly boy?
Let it be, don't disturb the love.
How does Jay Chou's new album sound?
